location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire to Edward Charles Ross

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Captain Lodden and Bullfinch's expected arrival in Muskat [Muscat] and Pelly's hopes of meeting the Captain at Lingeh [Bandar-e-Lengeh] and using the Bullfinchto visit the arab coast and tend to affairs there before coming on to Muskat and requesting that Ross make the necessary arrangements with the Captain on his arrival at Muskat.
